article_title: “Total annihilation”: Coronavirus may just be the end for many alt-weeklies
article_description: It was only seven days ago that we told you about The Stranger  the Seattle alt bi weekly that was facing a financial crisis because of the city s response to the coronavirus outbreak  which shut down concerts  bars  restaurants  and so many other events tha
